known_issues: Low contrast on Map tab: hovering over a grave tile shows a preview/info that is hard to read; needs improved color contrast.

existing_features.title: Improve the color contrast and overall readability of the hover preview (tooltip) shown when the user hovers a grave tile on the public “Map” tab, so that the grave identification information is clearly visible in both light and dark themes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve color contrast of grave info hover preview on the Map tab (grave tile hover tooltip/info is hard to read).
